title: Want to explain your matchmaking Riot?
body:
Im not good at top lane by any means, Im silver 1 top lane, trying to get all my lanes into gold.

Can you please tell me why im Vs Gold 1 Riven mains with 1million mastery points.

replies.body:
the only thing relevant to matchmaking is the fact that riven was gold 1.

mastery isnt taken into account for matchmaking. being that youre already mid-low gold in 2 roles, a gold 1 riven isnt too far off tbh. its probably attempting to boost your MMR higher because you're already gold in 2 other roles.

While you’re generally correct, it’s not the rank that matters, but the MMR. MMR is more fluid than rank - someone performing badly will lose a *lot* of MMR in a dozen or two games, while their rank will not fall as much in the same time. This is to provide the rank a buffer zone for bad days/weeks or off champions/etc.

The hidden MMR of that player may very well have been lower than Gold 1, and the hidden MMR of OP been higher than silver 1.
